EmailTemplate.description: Email that is sent out after merchant has been in business for over 6 months.
EmailTemplate.name: You May Now Be Eligible!
EmailTemplate.subject: You are now eligible for a "Cash Advance"!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
According to our records, you may now be eligible to re-apply for a cash advance. If you would like to revisit our working capital option and receive a free quote, please contact us at 877-467-2743 or email me at Sales@rapidadvance.com.
We look forward to helping your business grow in the near future.
Sincerely,
RapidAdvance
